Name: 女巫与六便士 the sibyl and sixpence
About the game: It's a 15-minute experimental visual novel about a love affair as weak as tea. Story consists of two chapters, formed by a mixture of four clues. It tells a love story about the sibyl and the prince. “You know, it was not easy to write such a story. ” “It seemed like taking every last bit of my sixpences from my piggy bank.” “The thing is, all the piggy banks needs to be smashed into pieces,” “before you took the coins out.” Steam Platform's 'the Sibyl and Sixpence' is more used for the collection of players, and all the revenue generated from PC sales will be devoted to the development of 'Falsemen2::Upstream'. Yesen.Midnight wrote Thank you for reading my story.
Developers: 吃了就睡工作室,夜神不说话
